pullrequest.title: Get plugin info with Ignition transport service

content.raw:
According to [this](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2437/upgrade-to-ign-transport2/diff#comment-23172999) comment on another PR, ign-transport2 won't be in Xenial, is that a problem for gazebo8?

In fact, I built locally against ign-transport1 and it worked. I added cmake status messages so it's easier to know the version being used: 1881d70
content.html:
According to this comment on another PR, ign-transport2 won't be in Xenial, is that a problem for gazebo8?

In fact, I built locally against ign-transport1 and it worked. I added cmake status messages so it's easier to know the version being used: 1881d70
